name: Saolin's Neopets Theme - 21st Century Edition
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT - Nothing appears broken, but no guarantees

Thank you to all who have used my theme over the years and to those who have modified it for their own uses. Inspired by what I saw in some of those modifications, I set out to make this theme even better than it was before. While some styles were inspired by these modifications, all code is 100% my own. Since I have learned a lot more about CSS selectors over the years, this theme is only going to get better with time.

Please mail all bugs to me! Otherwise only pages I frequent will actually get done.
